name: Resume & CV Notion Template Bundle
description: Welcome to our Notion Resume & CV Template Bundle! These templates are designed so that you can start creating digital resumes to share as a link! It's also possible to share with other people for feedback.What's included in the FREEBIE?1 "Minimalist" Style Resume Template to try it outWhat's included in the FULL BUNDLE?32 Premium Resume/CV Notion Templates9 "Modern" Style Templates (includes Grey, Orange, Brown, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink, Red)9 "Simple" Style Templates (Grey, Orange
features: 1 "Minimalist" Style  Resume Template to try it out; 9 "Modern" Style Templates (includes Grey, Orange, Brown, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink, Red); 9 "Simple" Style Templates (Grey, Orange, Brown, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink, Red); 9 "Creative" Style Templates (Grey, Orange, Brown, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink, Red); 3 "Minimalist" Style Templates (Simple, Vertical, Horizontal); 2 "Professional" Style Templates (Simple, Elegant); 9 cover photos in Simple style (Grey, Orange, Brown, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink, Red); 9 cover photos in Modern style (Grey, Orange, Brown, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Pink, Red)
